<h1 align="center">
  kryptokrauts.com
</h1>

This is the repository for the kryptokrauts.com homepage.  

We are a group of blockchain enthusiasts building a community for blockchain and crypto.

Please visit us at kryptokrauts.com and have a look at our projects.

## Contribution
We are always open for new contributions especially for our krautTimeline. If you want to support us have a look at our contribution guide at: https://kryptokrauts.com/log/how-to-contribute
